Description:
Detects the command line executed when TeamViewer starts a session started by a remote host.
Once a connection has been started, an investigator can verify the connection details by viewing the "incoming_connections.txt" log file in the TeamViewer folder.


Author: Josh Nickels, Qi Nan
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Remote Access Tool - Team Viewer Session Started On Linux Host
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where parent_process_path like '%/teamviewer_service' and process_path like '%/teamviewer_desktop' and command like '%/teamviewer_desktop --ipcport 5939 --module 1'
